Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENTS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENTS

Title: Authorizes the village of Perry, county of Wyoming to hire a planning board member, zoning board of appeals member or zoning officer who are not residents of such village
Summary: Authorizes the village of Perry, county of Wyoming to hire a planning board member, zoning board of appeals member and zoning officer who are not residents of such village.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-300, Vil L; amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the village law and the public officers law, in relation to authorizing the village of Perry, county of Wyoming to hire a planning board member, zoning board of appeals member and zoning officer who are not residents of such village
